message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you get $30. It's a good offer for you in the first round, considering the inflation!
Alice, your offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This accounts for the fact that inflation hurts me more.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the last round where I'm getting a decent deal because of the inflation.  I'll take $65, and you get $35. It's better than what you'll get if you reject this.
